typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as float,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Salescloud
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as float,
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DetailCloud
Selectorderfields, Select1 join(Selectorderfields@OrderID == Select1@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(SourcedID = 1,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('1', OrderDetailID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Salescloud select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectorderfields
DetailCloud select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID = SourcedID,
		UniqueOrderID,
		OrderID = Select1@OrderID,
		ShipDate = OrderDetailID,
		TotalCost,
		OrderDetailID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		CustomerID,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Ordersdetail
